full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

### Tender Title
Development of Highly-Efficient and Cost-Effective Catalysts for Carbon Capture and Hydrogen Production via Catalytic Methane Cracking

### Tender Reference
cb-813-85461890

### Notice Information
* **Publication Date**: Thursday, February 29, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: Thursday, March 14, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date**: Thursday, March 14, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: Wednesday, March 28, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: Saturday, March 31, 2028

### Contracting Entity
Natural Resources Canada (NRCan)
580 Booth Street
Ottawa, ON K1A 0E4 Canada

### Procurement Details
* **Procurement Category**: Service Related (SRV)
* **Notice Type**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Procurement Method**: Advance Contract Award Notice
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Worldwide
* **Regions of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), and Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

### Tender Description
The Government of Canada invites qualified contractors to develop high-efficiency and cost-effective catalysts for carbon capture and hydrogen production via catalytic methane cracking.

### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Roya Ayam
* **Email**: [Roya.Ayam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca](mailto:Roya.Ayam@NRCan-RNCan.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: (613) 000-0000

### Attachments
* [Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/33156/acan--181332-5000080090.pdf)
